page.title: 09Market Hill-the market today
page.content: Every Thursday a market is held in the market square.People in vans come to set up stalls on which to put their goods.There are around a dozen different stalls selling toys,crockery,clothes,vegetables plants and foodstuff.Many of the goods on the market are new from factories or fresh from market gardens.Mum goes there every week and she says it is better than shops because it is much cheaper .The stall holders start to pack up at about 5 o'clock pm. The market is hundreds of years old and is very successful.The market has recently been brightened up with new paving and plant borders. With the Magistrates Court behind,the Market Square looks most picturesque on a Thursday morning in Summer. {County Primary.}
